Key Match Events: Andre Russell took his 50th T20 international wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase: "I'm very pleased. Starting the tournament with a win is always good. I needed to take it home for the team, and I did it."
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies began their tournament by fielding in Guyana
Others: Papua New Guinea had set a target of 137 for West Indies to chase
West Indies won by five wickets
